This is sample app that I am using to experiment with Android design pattern. I also use this app as an example to demonstrate my understanding of Android things during interview process

This app demonstrates following things:

  • Implementation of Android MVVM design pattern
  • Use of data binding, use of Kotlin coroutines for background jobs
  • Use of DI, and its use in unit tests
  • Various Android UI elements such
  • TODO Would like to start using Android Navigation framework to navigate

How to use the app

  • Click on the search icon on top right to initiate search
  • Click on item in the list to see details about movie, long press on the item to toggle favorite state of an item
  • Click on favorites icon in the bottom sheet to view saved favorites
